Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back Kalbarri Holiday Inn Perth City Centre monkey mia Western Australia 10 Day Northwest Adventure 9 Nights • Guided Tour Overview Inclusions Terms & Conditions Stay in the heart of Perth at Holiday Inn Perth City Centre , ideally located on Hay Street in the vibrant CBD. Surrounded by top restaurants, cafes, shopping, and entertainment, it’s the perfect base before embarking on your 7-Day Perth to Exmouth Guided Tour . Begin your journey in Perth, then travel north through Western Australia’s spectacular landscapes — from the dramatic gorges of Kalbarri National Park to the pristine beaches of Shark Bay and the playful dolphins of Monkey Mia. Continue to the World Heritage-listed Ningaloo Reef , where you can snorkel among vibrant coral, manta rays, and whale sharks. This unforgettable adventure captures the very best of WA’s wild beauty. Unplug and explore the untamed beauty of Australia’s northwest on this immersive 10-day journey through rugged gorges, ancient landscapes, and turquoise coastlines. From red dirt roads to reef-fringed beaches, this adventure blends outback thrills with coastal serenity. View more View less 9 nights + Guided Tour from $ 3129 per person share twin. Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : until 31 Mar 26 or until sold out Your inclusions 2 Nights at Holiday Inn Perth City Centre, Perth in a Standard Room 7 Day Perth to Exmouth Guided Tour With 6 Nights' accommodation ensuite accommodation, 6 x breakfast, 5 x lunch, 5 x dinner, Admission to 4 National Parks, Dolphin experience fees, Guided walks (up to 9km, grade 1-4), Hosted by an experienced driver-guide & Air-conditioned small group touring 1 Night at Holiday Inn Perth City Centre, Perth in a Standard Room Price from From $3129 per person share twin Travel: 04 Feb – 11 Mar 26 From $3479 per person share twin Travel: 08 Apr - 02 Dec 26 Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings to 31 Mar 26 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 28 Oct 25 • Prices are there after subject to change without notice until time of confirmation • International/Domestic flights not included. Book by 31 March 2026 unless sold out prior. Valid for departures starting Wednesday only between 04 Feb to 02 Dec 2026. Inclusions are subject to change based on supplier operational capabilities. Blackout dates and surcharges may apply over special events, public holidays, and holiday periods • Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Payment schedule will be advised at time of booking • Some surcharges, closeouts and accommodation restrictions apply • Min/max stays apply • Twin share is based on 2 adults sharing a room, bedding configurations may vary • If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense • Any hotel credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & can’t be exchanged for cash • Advertised prices are per person based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property • Packages are subject to availability • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
